// Property(ies): style

'.tabbed-bar-style-plain': { style: Ti.UI.BUTTON_STYLE_TEXT }

'.tabbed-bar-style-bottom-navigation[platform=android]': { style: Ti.UI.Android.TABS_STYLE_BOTTOM_NAVIGATION }
